result: Work and fatigue. In modernity, under the command of the world of merchandise and money, the prevalence of business (denying idleness) came to burry the empiric of rest, clearance and laziness, creating a positive ethics of work. The process of resignification of work in modern societies began from the emergence of a new mindsset, influenced by A) Hygiest reform, which fought the excessive and unhalety character of manufacturing work. B) Protestant reform, which expressed the importance of labor activities in the secularized world. C) Strength of unionism, which emerged in the Esteem of anarchism claiming labor rights. D) Participation of women in social movements, defending the right to work. E) Vision of Catholicism, which, since the Middle Ages, defended the dignity of labor and profit.
